# About
I am a Ph.D. student at Georgia Tech in the Computational Science and Engineering (CSE) department with a home unit in Aerospace Engineering. I received a B.S. in Mechanical Engineering and a B.S. in Computational Modeling and Data Analytics from Virginia Tech. 

## Research Interests 
* Machine Learning & Surrogate Modeling  
* Multi-Fidelity Modeling 
* Kernel-Based Regression
* Forward Uncertainty Quantification
